releases.message: Fix recent regression causing Dedupe screen to fail on WordPress. Update in-app version messaging.
Fix broken link to release notes.
Fix recent regressions relating to address searching and email invoices. Add utility to correct multilingual issues.
Fix recent regression in 5.1.1 due to incomplete backport
Fix recent regression in 5.2.0 when contribution reports include soft-credit column
Fix recent regression in 5.2.0 where backoffce event registration failed to load on WordPress
Fix seven security issues, including at least one highly critical
Fix regressions in PCP events, merge screen, and 'Check for Matching Contact'
Fixes regressions affecting SMS and Memcache users. Fix upgrade issues.
Fix recent regression affecting relationship-based smart-groups which predate 5.5.0
Fix regression which prevents editing CiviCase configuration on new sites
Fix regressions affecting (a) editing newly created option groups and (b) editing tags via profile
Fix regressions affecting certain reports, certain smart groups, menu alignment on Joomla, and an overzealous permission.

5.7.message: 5.7.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix regression in search task "Tag Contacts".
Fix regression in displaying UTF-8 in some dropdowns.
Fix regressions in (a) recalculating edited net-amount and (b) loading unnecessary/nonexistent file.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-01 through CIVI-SA-2019-07. (ESR)
Fix regression involving contact images. (ESR)
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-09 through CIVI-SA-2019-18. (ESR)
Fix regressions involving a date icon, a search setting, an email subject line, and an unnecessary warning.
Fix regressions involving activity-sequences, quick search by email, an API filter option, and two backend forms for CiviContribute/CiviMember.
Fix regressions involving (1) anonymous users of contribution/event-registration screens and (2) filters in "Manage Case" screen
Fix regression involving validation of backend credit card form
Fix regressions involving deletion of relationships, the "Change Case Status" form, and smart-groups on ACL-enabled systems.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-01 through CIVI-SA-2019-07.
Fix regressions involving (1) contact images, (2) pagination in contribution report, and (3) multi-group filtering in Search Builder.
Fix regression involving dedupe. Restore default menu color and allow customization.
Fix regressions involving menu presentation, contact dashboard, and mailing preview.
Fix regression involving "Find Pledges".
Fix regression involving CiviMail previews. Fix new installer diagnostic.
Fix regression involving WordPress & REST. Fix upgrade issue for multilingual sites.
Fix regressions involving "Activities" sort-order and CiviCase's inbound email attachments.
Fix regressions involving activity and event listings. Fix new warnings involving menus and profile creation.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-09 through CIVI-SA-2019-18.
Fix regressions involving certain membership statuses, D7 htmlpurifier, D8 public Javascript, jQuery in monorepos, re-sorting participants, and a breadcrumb.
Fix regressions involving some uploaded images, recurring contributions with legacy IPN, and exporting soft credits. (ESR)
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-19 through CIVI-SA-2019-23. (ESR)
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-24. (ESR)
Fix recent regressions involving some uploaded images and some activity submissions. Mitigate timeouts during status-check.
Fix recent regressions involving sample data-set and dashboard activity feed (with ACLs).
Fix recent regressions involving a refund use-case, a contribution report, and D8 CLI support.
Fix recent issues regarding search selections, activity custom data, a contribution message, and a MySQL status check.
Fix recent regressions involving custom searches and menu reloads.
Fix recent regression involving "Edit Financial Account".
Fix recent regressions involving CiviCase merges, custom file fields, and editing "Additional Details" of contributions. Improve error-reporting for unsupported PHP versions.
Fix recent regression involving smart-groups with relative date-filters.
Fix recent regression involving CiviCampaign deletion. Fix recent upgrade issue with handling pptx files.
Fix recent regression involving Advanced Search (with email).
Fix recent regressions involving Advanced Search (with email), CiviReport styling, and D8 warnings.
Fix recent regressions involving the "export" hook, custom-fields for events, and configurations which have disabled "Household" contacts.
Fix recent regression involving new recurring memberships created through backend.
Fix recent regressions involving new memberships and exports.
Fix recent regressions involving import/export and profile search results.
Fix recent regressions involving certain pending memberships and certain pending contributions.
Fix recent regressions involving certain PayPal-based memberships, "Additional Payments", the "Dedupe" API, and certain reports and notification-emails.
Fix recent regressions involving certain upgrade scenarios, mailing reports, and an unnecessary warning.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-19 through CIVI-SA-2019-23. Fix recent regressions.
Fix recent regression involving wp-cli and CiviMail hyperlinks.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-24. Fix recent regressions.
Fix recent regressions involving relational memberships and the upgrader.
Fix recent regressions involving partial-payments and multi-participant payments.
Fix recent regressions involving participant names, membership receipts, and membership imports.

5.21.message: 5.21.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent regressions involving "Enable multiple bulk emails" and "Payment Summary" table.
Fix recent regressions involving contact date-filters, certain receipts, certain smart-groups, and localized installation.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2020-01 through CIVI-SA-2020-08. (ESR)
Fix recent regressions involving certain searches, certain one-time donations, upgrades, and deduping on custom-data.
Fix recent regressions involving Civi<=>WP navigation and an unnecessary warning.
Fix recent regression involving frontend screens on Joomla.
Fix recent regression involving certain malformed resource URLs.
Fix recent regression involving CMS's which are deployed to a subdirectory.
Fix recent regressions involving the web-based upgrader and certain smart groups.
Fix recent regressions involving DB_DataObject, localization warnings, and upgrade issues for certain extensions.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2020-01 through CIVI-SA-2020-08.
Fix recent regressions involving CiviMail unsubscribes and Drupal 8.7.
Fix recent regressions involving SMTP error-handling and searching on customized, reciprocal relationships.
Fix recent regressions involving "CiviContribute Component Settings" and the "Activity Detail" report.
Fix recent regressions involving frontend credit card validator and certain checkboxes. Revise MySQL version notices.
Fix recent regressions involving smart groups, CiviContribute, certain APIv3 options, and dedupe performance. Revise deprecation notices.

5.27.message: 5.27.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent regressions involving upgrader and CiviMail on Joomla.
Fix recent regressions involving display of deleted contacts, deduping, reporting with time filters, and CiviMail on WordPress/Joomla.
Fix recent issue with upgrading.
Fix recent regressions involving default contribution amounts, CiviMail error-handling, CiviCase action links, and WordPress data-files.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2020-09 through CIVI-SA-2020-19. (ESR)
Fix recent regressions involving deleted contacts, Drupal Views, contribution cancellation, dedupe-exceptions, and an icon. (ESR)
Fix recent regressions involving tax calculations, CiviCase assignments, and custom-field administration. (ESR)
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2020-09 through CIVI-SA-2020-19.
Fix recent issue with upgrading.
Fix recent regressions involving deleted contacts, Drupal Views, contribution cancellation, dedupe-exceptions, and an icon.
Fix recent regressions involving tax calculations, CiviCase assignments, and custom-field administration.
Fix recent regressions involving PayPal Pro, message-template permissions, custom-field API, and deduping certain contacts.
Fix recent regressions involving "Group" styling, events on the user dashboard, mail to recently deleted contacts, and editing relationship types.
Fix recent regressions involving (1) adding contacts to groups on certain screens and (2) handling PayPal statuses on certain configurations.
Fix recent regressions involving (1) recurring contributions, (2) advanced search and certain custom fields, (3) exporting non-primary fields.

Fix recent regressions involving (1) restrictions on financial types, (2) currency labels, (3) bulk-registering participants, (4) searching/viewing participants, (5) exporting non-primary fields, and (6) the upgrader.

5.33.message: 5.33.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent regressions involving (1) translations on contribution pages and (2) upgrades on systems with certain third-party modules.
Fix recent regressions involving CiviGrant exports and version reporting.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2021-01 through CIVI-SA-2021-07. (ESR)
Backport cryptography options
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2021-08. (ESR)
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2021-01 through CIVI-SA-2021-07.
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2021-08.
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2021-08.
Fix recent regressions involving Joomla permission management and "Thank-You Dates".
Fix recent regressions involving non-decimal currencies on some payment processors.
Fix recent regressions involving custom-fields on events, certain return-links, membership processing with some payment processors, and inbound email handling with some uncommon addresses.

Fix recent regressions involving circular groups, listings with related contacts, certain CiviContribute tasks, pricing of limited-time events when using back-office forms, ReCAPTCHA admin, some smart group configurations, and certain URL fragments in WordPress.
Fix recent regressions involving Contact Dashboard, actions in Search Kit, and rendering of some pages on WordPress.
Fix recent regressions involving Quick Search, processing some prices in CiviContribute, free memberships, batch-updates for memberships, and APIv3 performance.
Fix recent regressions involving scheduled SMS reminders and OAuth token renewal.
Fix recent regressions involving data-export, line-item subtotals when using APIs+taxes, and certain scheduled reminders.
Fix recent regression involving "New Contribution". Fix recent upgrade issues involving "scssphp" and "dataprocessor".
Fix recent regression involving smart-groups.
Fix recent regressions involving membership creation and Search Kit.
Fix recent regressions involving maps, CiviEvent PDFs, smart-group upgrades, and some unusual custom-field-sets.
Fix recent compatibility issue with Drupal 9.

5.45.message: 5.45.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent regressions involving image uploads, relationship data-entry, mail-merge tokens, and external hyperlinks.
Fix recent regressions involving core extension upgrades and handling of greetings.
Fix recent issue with running upgrades.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2022-01 through CIVI-SA-2022-05. (ESR)
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2022-06. (ESR)
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2022-07. (ESR)
Fix recent regression involving APIv3. (ESR)
Fix recent regressions involving custom fields (type "Money") and the status check API.
Fix recent regressions involving APIv3 ("Duplicatecheck" and records with numerical names).
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2022-01 through CIVI-SA-2022-05.
Fix recent regressions involving upgrades and CiviGrant.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2022-01 through CIVI-SA-2022-05 and recent upgrade issues.
Rollback CiviEvent Timezone changes. Fix recent regressions.
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2022-06 and multilingual upgrade issues.
Fix recent issues involving CiviGrant statuses, CiviMail validation, and upgrades.
Fix recent issues involving CiviContribute backend, financial ACLs, some "Employer" relationships, and sorting in Search Kit.
Fix recent issues involving APIv4 (Contact.getFields) and the fallback certificate file.
Fix recent issues involving Scheduled Reminders.
Fix recent issues involving recurring contributions, Guzzle, and certain tokens and translations.
Fix security issue CIVI-SA-2022-07 and recent regression involving checksum-links.
Fix recent regression involving APIv3.
Fix recent regression involving APIv3.
Fix recent regressions involving ukgiftaid, CiviMember configuration, and unusual hook errors. Update Guzzle.
Fix recent regressions involving membership renewals and editing of recurring contributions.
Fix recent regressions involving "on behalf of" payments, price-set formatting, and "Recent Item" permissions. Update Guzzle.

5.51.message: 5.51.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent issues involving certain imports, access to view contributions, and PHPUnit compatibility.
Fix recent issues involving certain tokens and geocoding rules in extensions. Update DOMPDF. Improve upgrader.
Fix recent issues involving backend credit-card processing and import performance.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-01, -02, and -03.
Fix recent issues involving WP plugin compatibility, imports, Search Kit, and Afform.
Fix recent issues involving custom-data, CiviMail,dashlets, imports, and Zeta mail.
Fix recent issues involving imports.
Fix recent issues involving imports, extension management, and event badges.
Fix recent issues involving imports, extension management, and PHP 8.1.
Fix recent issues involving navigation menu and country fields for payments.
Fix recent issues involving WordPress status-checks, Backdrop UI, sample data, and Afform installation.
Fix recent issues involving CiviContribute displays, CiviContribute imports, CiviAccount batches, Flexmailer tracking, and a SearchKit warning.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-01, -02, and -03.

5.57.message: 5.57.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent issues involving Joomla CLI, SearchKit "Update", contribution listings, asset-building, and signing-keys.
Fix recent issues involving CiviEvent's offline emails, CiviEvent defaults, Form Builder auto-completion, and upgrades for large databases.
Fix recent issues involving CiviMail "resubscribe" requests and display of soft-contributions.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-04, -05, and -06. (ESR)
Fix recent issues involving contribution imports and PayPal Pro.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-04, -05, and -06 as well as other recent issues.
Fix recent issues involving contribution pages, multi-lingual upgrades, and state-province tokens.
Fix recent issues involving contribution imports and PayPal Pro.
Fix recent issues involving contribution imports and merging "Organization" records.
Fix recent issues involving "Case" deletion, extraneous confirmation fields, sorting soft-credits, and "Event" API.
Fix compatibility with Drupal v9.5.9.
Fix recent issues with CiviMember forms and warnings on Drupal.
Fix recent issue with CiviMember forms.
Fix recent issue with CiviMember layout and processing help text.
Fix recent issues with mail blasts on WordPress, CiviMember discounts, and an extraneous output.

5.63.message: 5.63.x is an Extended Security Release.

releases.message: Fix recent issues with click-through tracking, "Accepted credit cards", toggling components, and errors on PHP 8.
Fix recent issues with certain kinds of custom fields.
Fix recent issues with editing certain price options and displaying some custom computations.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-07 through CIVI-SA-2023-15 and two other issues. (ESR)
Fix recent issues involving CiviMail UI, administration of CiviMember price sets, and more.
Fix recent issues involving Search Kit bulk actions, administration of CiviMember price sets, and more.
Fix recent issues involving free (unpaid) events.
Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2023-07 through CIVI-SA-2023-15 and two other issues.
Fix recent issues involving upgrades, CiviEvent tokens, and testing.
Fix recent issues involving upgrades.
Fix recent issues involving custom data for CiviEvent, parent-child groups, and more.
Fix recent issue involving scheduled reminders.
Fix recent issues involving the Quick Search bar, certain Search Kit queries, CiviEvent self-service transfers, and more.
Fix recent issues involving event registration (multi-profile), filtering of bounce-messages, editing "Contribution Date", and more.
Fix recent issue with CiviMail's inbound email processing.
Fix recent issues with CiviEvent calendars (iCal), the View/Edit Contact screens, and dompdf.
